title: 500 Vegan Dishes-Deborah Gray.epub
description:

As the vegan diet grows in popularity-for reasons of personal health or environmental sustainability-more people seek information on how to fully enjoy or integrate it into their lives in a safe and healthful way. 

500 Vegan Dishes has all the information you need: the basics of the diet; a guide to potentially less familiar or important vegan ingredients; easy substitutions for common dairy, egg, meat, and other animal-based ingredients; and 500 fantastic easy-to-follow recipes.

Focused on green living and the art of cooking, DEBORAH GRAY is a highly experienced writer and editor. Author of The Green Website Guide for Better Living and Vegetarian Cooking Made Easy, Deborah has also co-written The BakerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Bible, Start It (appetizers), Indulge It (desserts) and The Complete Book of Cookies. Deborah is a regular contributor to food and parenting magazines. Having lived and worked in the United States, she now writes on a freelance basis from her home in Wiltshire, UK
